text: The Bersih 4 rally was a large protest held in Malaysia in August 2015. It was organized by the Bersih group, which advocates for clean and fair elections. The rally took place in Kuala Lumpur and other cities, and people gathered to demand reforms in the electoral system, fight against corruption, and call for the resignation of Prime Minister Najib Razak. The event was peaceful but showed strong public support for changes in the government. Former Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad also attended the Bersih 4 rally. ==Related pages== *1Malaysia Development Berhad scandal ==References== Category:2010s in Malaysia Category:Politics of Malaysia
title: Bersih 4 rally
